data.actual_result: The entry allows you to edit the name while the delete buttom is visible
data.expected_result: The entry closes to hide the delete option
data.short_description: Able to edit an emoji name while the entry is swiped over
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage emoji - Go into the emoji tab on settings - Swipe one of the entries over so you see the delete option - Tap on the emoji entry like you were going to edit the name - Observe the screen
